[00:00.00]Drinkin’ Beer. Talkin’ God. Amen. (feat. Florida Georgia Line) - Chase Rice
[00:03.18]Chase Rice：
[00:06.37]Firewood crackle in the fall air
[00:08.82]"Red Dirt" playing on a radio
[00:11.04]Big Dipper hanging high up there
[00:12.96]
[00:13.47]Breathe in the Backwoods and let it go
[00:15.94]I ain't ever been the church goin' type
[00:17.78]
[00:18.34]Can't quote much past 3:16
[00:20.20]
[00:20.81]Even though it's a Friday night
[00:22.61]
[00:23.55]Church found me
[00:24.07]
[00:24.73]Sittin' here drinkin' beer talkin' God amen
[00:29.49]Killin' time livin' life with some downhome friends
[00:34.32]When the world's gone crazy man it all makes sense
[00:39.10]Sittin' here drinkin' beer talkin' God amen amen
[00:44.89]Chase Rice/Tyler Hubbard：
[00:45.59]
[00:46.88]Tell 'em boys
[00:47.22]
[00:48.58]Yeah baby
[00:48.81]Tyler Hubbard/Brian Kelley：
[00:49.58]Gotta thank him for a little piece of dirt
[00:52.17]Little peace of mind from a cold one
[00:54.35]Got a country angel I don't deserve
[00:56.20]
[00:56.78]The kind that you never let go of
[00:58.55]Florida Georgia Line/Tyler Hubbard：
[00:59.14]I don't know what Heaven looks like
[01:01.53]No I don't think anybody does
[01:04.14]If it's like down here up there tonight
[01:06.40]And there's folks like us
[01:07.24]Florida Georgia Line/Brian Kelley：
[01:07.89]Sittin' here drinkin' beer talkin' God Amen
[01:11.49]Talkin' God amen
[01:12.59]Killin' time livin' life with some downhome friends
[01:16.23]With some downhome friends
[01:17.37]When the world's gone crazy man it all makes sense
[01:22.34]Sittin' here drinkin' beer talkin' God amen amen
[01:28.12]
[01:30.67]Talkin' God amen
[01:32.67]Chase Rice：
[01:32.94]
[01:37.71]I don't know what Heaven looks like
[01:39.61]
[01:40.31]And who the hell does
[01:41.67]
[01:42.34]If it's like down here up there tonight
[01:44.44]
[01:44.96]There's folks like us
[01:46.07]Both：
[01:46.28]Sittin' here drinkin' beer talkin' God Amen
[01:50.50]
[01:51.02]Killin' time livin' life with some downhome friends
[01:56.75]
[01:58.33]Sittin' here drinkin' beer talkin' God Amen
[02:02.46]
[02:03.09]Killin' time livin' life with some downhome friends
[02:07.20]
[02:07.81]When the world's gone crazy man it all makes sense
[02:11.43]Man it all makes sense

data.trans:
[ti: Drinkin’ Beer. Talkin’ God. Amen. (feat. Florida Georgia Line)]
[ar:Chase Rice]
[al:Drinkin’ Beer. Talkin’ God. Amen. (feat. Florida Georgia Line)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:03.18]//
[00:06.37]秋高气爽 柴火劈啪作响
[00:08.82]收音机里正播放着《Red Dirt》
[00:11.04]北斗七星高悬于空中
[00:12.96]
[00:13.47]呼吸着雪茄的烟气 放任自流
[00:15.94]我从来不是那种会去教堂的人
[00:17.78]
[00:18.34]说不清楚《约翰福音》第3章第16节以后的内容
[00:20.20]
[00:20.81]即使这是美好的周五夜晚
[00:22.61]
[00:23.55]教堂发现我
[00:24.07]
[00:24.73]相聚于此 喝着啤酒 与上帝交谈 说着阿门
[00:29.49]消磨时光 与乡下的朋友享受人生
[00:34.32]当世界陷入疯狂时 哥们 一切都会变得意义非凡
[00:39.10]相聚于此 喝着啤酒 与上帝交谈 说着阿门
[00:44.89]//
[00:45.59]
[00:46.88]告诉这些男孩
[00:47.22]
[00:48.58]宝贝
[00:48.81]//
[00:49.58]感谢他赐予我一片土地
[00:52.17]冰镇啤酒带给我一丝宁静
[00:54.35]拥有一位如天使般的爱人 即使我配不上
[00:56.20]
[00:56.78]但是你不愿轻易放手
[00:58.55]//
[00:59.14]我不知道天堂是什么样子
[01:01.53]我想这世上没有人会知道
[01:04.14]如果那里就像今晚一般令人沉醉
[01:06.40]那也会有像我们这样的人
[01:07.24]//
[01:07.89]相聚于此 喝着啤酒 与上帝交谈 说着阿门
[01:11.49]与上帝交谈 说着阿门
[01:12.59]消磨时光 与乡下的朋友享受人生
[01:16.23]与乡下的朋友一起
[01:17.37]当世界陷入疯狂时 哥们 一切都会变得意义非凡
[01:22.34]相聚于此 喝着啤酒 与上帝交谈 说着阿门
[01:28.12]
[01:30.67]与上帝交谈 说着阿门
[01:32.67]//
[01:32.94]
[01:37.71]我不知道天堂是什么样子
[01:39.61]
[01:40.31]那谁会知道呢
[01:41.67]
[01:42.34]如果那里就像今晚一般令人沉醉
[01:44.44]
[01:44.96]那也会有像我们这样的人
[01:46.07]//
